this is lame, they say they gave a date for release but not a time...so it's possible that they don't have it enable till 11:59pm, I mean clearly they're not familiar with how only giving a release date works and that if no time is given it means that its available as soon as the day starts, if you weren't sure if it would be ready or not maybe don't give a date?? just say between 16-20 of December, the whole covering your tracks by saying "we didn't say what time hehehe" is sad, but whatever I'll just sit here, disappointed; waiting to give you my money.
